questions.question: Which of the following is the SI unit of force?
questions.explanation: The SI unit of force is Newton (N), named after Sir Isaac Newton.

questions.subject: English
questions.question: Which of these is a correct use of semicolon?
options: I love cooking; my brother does too.
I love cooking; and my brother.
I love; cooking my brother does too.
I love cooking; because my brother does.
questions.explanation: A semicolon is used to join two independent clauses that are closely related in meaning.
